description: One of the most popular restaurants in the historic centre of Rome, Shiroya has just a few tables, so booking ahead is recommended. Served with courtesy and professionalism, dishes include well-known Japanese specialities such as home-made gyoza (dumplings) with various fillings, tempura and other fried options, the inevitable raw fish in all the classic combinations, ramen, different rice dishes and much more besides.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
